title: Personalized Health Monitoring – Alerts for Abnormal Health Conditions
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to receive alerts for abnormal health conditions so that I can maintain my health and independence without feeling monitored.

title: Automated Medication Reminders
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to provide automated medication reminders so that I can stay on top of my health without feeling monitored or overwhelmed.

title: Voice-Activated Emergency Calls
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to easily make emergency calls using voice commands so that I can feel secure and maintain my independence without the fear of being monitored.

title: Wellness Activity Suggestions – Cognitive Games Tailored to User Abilities
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want personalized cognitive stimulation games that match my abilities so that I can maintain my cognitive sharpness without feeling overwhelmed or monitored.

title: User-Centric Data Privacy Controls - User-Defined Data Sharing Preferences
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to have control over what personal data is shared and with whom, so that I can maintain my privacy while still receiving support from ALFRED.

title: Customizable Care Plans
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want a customizable care plan that adapts to my health needs so that I can maintain my cognitive abilities and health without feeling monitored.

title: Family Communication Support – Scheduled Check-in Reminders for Family
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to receive scheduled check-in reminders for my family members so that I can maintain my social connections and feel supported without feeling monitored.
